name: Metagross
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: With four linked brains, it’s more intelligent than a supercomputer, and it uses calculations to analyze foes.

abilities.name: Plasma Search
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Team Plasma card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. You may not use an Ability with the same name during your turn.

attacks.name: Mind Bend
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
